_header: Cloister of Christ rich recent fleur-de-lis
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 317.
Title(s): ‘Ane Ballat in Praise of Our Lady’
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of
_description: Walter Kennedy, ‘Ane Ballat in Praise of Our Lady’ — nine 8-line stanzas

Asloan.First Lines:
Closter of crist riche Recent flour de lysAue maria herbar of
                    amouris…
Asloan.Last Lines:
…Senn hale suple to kennedy þou artO mater dei memento
                        mei þi man
Asloan.Note:
MS also paginated = pp. 622-625; nineteenth-century transcription is
                        Edinburgh,  Edinburgh University Library La.IV.27, item 7.
